title: World Cup Pro Bike Check: Yolanda Neff’s Olympic Gold Trek Supercaliber XC Race Bike
content:
After a dominating gold medal ride at the Tokyo Olympics, Yolanda Neff and Trek mountain bike design extraordinaire Katy Steudel took to the lab to create the perfect graphics and paint scheme for the newly crowned champion. Steudel and Neff took inspiration from Japanese tranquility, apple blossoms, mountains, and bamboo. The canvas is Trek’s top-of-the-line

The post World Cup Pro Bike Check: Yolanda Neff’s Olympic Gold Trek Supercaliber XC Race Bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
